str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A primary verb; to bathe.
From the base of chraomai or chre; employment, i.e. An affair; also occasion, demand, requirement or destitution.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
To wash; mid. I wash my own (hands, etc.). To cleanse; ceremonially, to perform ablution.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The foot. A primary word; a 'foot'.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
All, the whole, entire, complete. A primary word; 'whole' or 'all', i.e. Complete, especially as noun or adverb.
Clean.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Clean.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
By no means, not at all. Intensive of ou; not indeed.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
